forward_header_name.description: The name of the header that is used to set the decrypted value.

key_sets.description: Denote the name or names of all Key Sets that should be inspected when trying to find a suitable key to decrypt the JWE token.

lookup_header_name.description: The name of the header to look for the JWE token.

strict.description: Defines how the plugin behaves in cases where no token was found in the request. When using `strict` mode, the request requires a token to be present and subsequently raise an error if none could be found.
